event.title: was granted its first town charter by King Richard I in 1189

data.event: It was granted its first town charter by King Richard I in 1189 and its first mayor was appointed by King John in 1215.

event.title: was appointed by King John in 1215

data.event: It was granted its first town charter by King Richard I in 1189 and its first mayor was appointed by King John in 1215.

event.title: two medieval battles; the Battle of Northampton (1264

data.event: The town is also the site of two medieval battles; the Battle of Northampton (1264) and the second in 1460.

event.title: suffered the Great Fire of Northampton (1675

data.event: The town also suffered the Great Fire of Northampton (1675) which destroyed most of the town.
